amendment.description: To modify the calculation of fuel economy for gaseous fuel dual fueled automobiles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3251 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2953.
